Package utility.field

Class FieldObject

java.lang.Object
utility.field.FieldObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameUnit, Inanimate, Projectile
public abstract class FieldObject
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FieldObject​(float x, float y)
    Initialize a new field object at Map position x, y.

  • Constructor Details

    • FieldObject

      public FieldObject​(float x, float y)
      Initialize a new field object at Map position x, y.
      Parameters:
      x - map x locaiton. - defines center of the object.
      y - map y location. - defines center of the object.

  • Method Details

    • changePos

      public void changePos​(float xChange, float yChange)
      change position in the map. positive indicates down and right.
      Parameters:
      xChange - change in x
      yChange - change in y

    • getX

      public float getX()
      get map oriented X position.
      Returns:
      x

    • setXPosition

      public void setXPosition​(float newXPos)
      set a new X position individually relative to map.

    • getY

      public float getY()
      get map oriented Y position.
      Returns:
      y

    • setYPosition

      public void setYPosition​(float newYPos)
      set a new X position individually relative to map.

    • getPosition

      public java.awt.Point getPosition()

    • draw

      public void draw​(DrawingSurface surface, float adjustedX, float adjustedY)
      method to draw the specific FieldObject. this will use adjusted values, since the DrawingSurface view is different from appearance due to map structure.
      Parameters:
      surface - game window
      adjustedX - view adjusted x
      adjustedY - view adjusted y

    • getBoundary

      public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float getBoundary()
      get the bounding rectangle of the specific FieldObject
      Returns:
      an instance of Rectangle2D.Float specifying the boundary of the FieldObject
